channel.title: CVE Feed for CurrencyRate.today -- Crypto Converter Widget
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CurrencyRate.today -- Crypto Converter Widget

item.title: CVE-2023-49150|2024-08-02T21:46:29.383Z -- currencyrate.today -- crypto%20converter%20widget
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in CurrencyRate.Today Crypto Converter Widget allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Crypto Converter Widget: from n/a through 1.8.1.
